activities: eSkill is an online assessment testing provider founded in 1998. Companies, including those in Europe and Switzerland, can request eSkill’s services to test skill level in their potential candidates or employees. The personal information request by eSkill from these potential candidates or employees, in order to perform the tests, is limited to their full name and email address.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Test takers' personal information includes full name and email address.
recoursemech: eSkill commits to cooperate in the investigation and resolution process with the European Union data protection authorities (EU DPAs) or Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
